product_name: Ortlieb Back-Roller Black N' White Panniers - Pair
long_description: When heading out on a weekend bike trip, keep your goods dry and protected in the Ortlieb Back-Roller Black N' White Bike Panniers. They are designed for rear bike tracks. PVC-free fabric made of coated nylon offers waterproof toughness. QL2.1 system fits racks up to 16mm in tube diameter, and includes adapter for 8, 10 and 12mm. Inner pocket; large reflectors; shoulder carrying strap. Ortlieb Back-Roller Black N' White Bike Panniers come as a pair.
short_description: When heading out on a weekend bike trip, keep your goods dry and protected in the Ortlieb Back-Roller Black N' White Bike Panniers. They are designed for rear bike tracks.
